mapper.insert: insert into members ( userid, userpass,username, useremail, usertel, zipcode, address, detail_address, extra_address, userimg, oruserimg, userprofile, userip ) values ( #{userid}, #{userpass}, #{username}, #{useremail}, #{usertel}, #{zipcode}, #{address}, #{detail_address}, #{extra_address}, #{userimg}, #{oruserimg}, #{userprofile}, #{userip} )
